Text: i'm running a mac and can't seem to get audio. am i missing any codecs? which ones are they and how do i install them? it doesn't play in divx player or quicktime with the audio, only VLC plays it.
picture is okay, has a bright green strip along the bottom. Audio sounds cinimatic. if you can put up with that its an okay version.. not the best but i havent downloaded any other versions...
